name: Archangel Michael and the other bodiless Powers of Heaven
troparia: (Tone 4) Princes of the heavenly hosts,* we, though unworthy, beg you* to encircle us through your prayers* under the shelter of the wings of your spiritual glory.* Guard us as we come to you and sincerely cry:* “Deliver us from dangers,* O princes of the powers on high!”
kontakia: (Tone 2) Princes of God’s hosts, ministers of divine glory,* leaders of angels and guides of men,* pray for our welfare and for great mercy,* O princes of the incorporeal powers.
prokimenon: He makes spirits His angels and flaming fire His ministers.
Bless the Lord, O my soul; O Lord my God, you are very great
alleluia: Praise the Lord, all you His angels; praise Him, all you powers.
For He spoke, and they came into being; He commanded and they were created
communion: He makes spirits His angels,* and flaming fire His ministers.
